review_data.title: Bday Swiss Trip

review_data.title: As close to a traditional British pub as you can get in Zurich

review_data.title: Amazing place!!

review_data.title: Great Pub

review_data.title: Best Place To Stop In Zurich - Must See

review_data.title: Nice and chill

review_data.title: Best in Town

review_data.title: Had a great night here and came back a second time

review_data.title: Gutes Bier und Essen
review_data.content: Das Oliver Twist ist eine Empfehlung wert. Das Bier ist gut, das Essen ist auch gut und die Angestellten sind...More

review_data.title: Watch your wallet
review_data.content: I went back this week for the first time in a few years (when my wallet was stolen whilst watching the football on a Saturday afternoon, and when I told the barman heard the sympathetic response "oh not again"). The bar itself is fine, plenty...More

review_data.title: Ronseal...
review_data.content: I was here 4 years ago on a Saturday and as great lively atmosphere. Popped in this Sunday and very relaxed pub but heard they'd had a great Saturday night . Staff were ace. Patrons were friendly. Didn't eat but everything else spot on. Cheers!

review_data.title: Хороший паб в Цюрихе
review_data.content: Очень достойный паб, особенно в случае Швейцарии. Пиво на уровне еда как в пабе рекомендую, если не притендуете на изыски...More

review_data.title: Awesome pub!
review_data.content: I use to drink here years ago and it has always been a great place to go when in Zurich. Great atmosphere and very friendly staff. They didn't do food when I was here last but I would definitely recommend!

review_data.title: Immer ein Abstecher wert
review_data.content: Wenn wir im Niederdörfli unterwegs sind, ist das Oliver Twist ein Pflichthalt. Sehr netter Staff und gutes Bier. Preise halt...More

review_data.title: Cooles Pub
review_data.content: Immer einen Besuch wert, wenn man Lust auf ein Bier und einen feinen Burger hat. Service ist auch freundlich und...More

review_data.title: Обычный бар!
review_data.content: Обычный бар! Непритязательная еда для непритязательных посетителей. Нужно обратить внимание что большинство посетителей британцы, и явно завсегдатые этого заведения, так...More

review_data.title: Hamburger e pubquiz.
review_data.content: Bel locale per serate con gli amici. Sempre piuttosto affollato; consigliabile la prenotazione per grandi gruppi. Hamburger gigante e delizioso....More

review_data.title: Great fun
review_data.content: Great bar staff & friendly owner make the best place in Zurich to pop in for a pint or to watch sport. Watch out for Pedro the crazy zebra and 'electrode darts'. My friends and I will definitely stop in again next time we're in...More

review_data.title: Evening out
review_data.content: It was so nice we went back there the second day to drink and eat. I will recoment the food really enjoyed evering. People were friendly gave us a guiness glas for free to take home for souvernior.

review_data.title: Deutsch ist kein Thema
review_data.content: Das in einem Englischen Pub viel Publikum aus dem englischen Sprachraum verkehrt, ist mir klar. Aber das Herr und Frau...More

review_data.title: Nice pub. Mediocre food.
review_data.content: It's difficult to believe this is the oldest put in Zurich when it was only opened in 1970! We popped in for a couple of pints and a bite to eat on Sunday afternoon. Obligatory live Premiership football is shown on one of the many...More

review_data.title: A real British Pub....
review_data.content: This is part of an excellent chain of British Pubs in Switzerland. We have been to all of them. The Oliver Twist is "our Pub" while in Zurich. Very friendly and helpful staff. We have never sampled the food at this facility.....basically because this Pub...More

review_data.title: OK But one of many
review_data.content: Sunday went to the pub just to say that we had been there. Drinks were expensive but this seems to be the way in Zurich. Bit of advice. Go buy your drinks at one of the many Co-Ops and take them to your hotel. Just...More

review_data.title: Läuft immer etwas
review_data.content: Sind immer sehr gerne in diesem Pub. Glück muss man haben, wenn man am Abend Platz findet. Sehr netti Bedienung...More

review_data.title: Super Pub in der Altstadt
review_data.content: Super Pub in der Altstadt. Super Pub Food. Super Service. Sehr gut für Sport Events. Burger sehr empfehlenswert. genial auch...More

review_data.title: Worst Service EVER
review_data.content: Most unfriendly bar attender I've ever seen. I was trying to a burger for 1 hour. After 1 hour as I've kindly asked the service to give my money back, I was shouted and the money were almost thrown in my face. I won't go...More

review_data.title: Excellent
review_data.content: Had a fantastic meal here, the service was excellent could not fault it. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Would happily recommend.

review_data.title: Best pub outside of Ireland
review_data.content: Great pub all I can say!. Service top (Brendan bought me a round) If it was cause I'm Irish I don't know but still amazing. Rugby best game ever Ireland won the six nations against France in Paris! !!There are some very decent people around...More

review_data.title: Shambles
review_data.content: Waited for 20 minutes for food that still hadn't been cooked. No refund was offered when I had to leave for lack of time. So that was CHF42 for half a pint of beer (which was nothing like London Pride); even by Swiss standards that...More

review_data.title: A great afternoons rugby, drink and food
review_data.content: Returning from a ski trip and desperate to see England Wales six nations match 12 of us set off from Hauptbahnhof having found it on their website. A 12 minute walk later and we were not disappointed, with several TV's, good lager and bitter, welcoming...More

review_data.title: A Friendly Place in Zurich
review_data.content: When my wife and I moved to Zurich from NYC in mid-2013, we wanted to find a place to watch Formula 1 races on Sundays, and this was closest to our apartment (thanks Yelp). The staff and customers we're so welcoming and friendly, that is...More

review_data.title: Attesa interminabile...
review_data.content: Abbiamo scelto questo locale girovagando per le vie del centro. Volevamo mangiare un hamburger velocemente e bere una buona birra...More

review_data.title: A proper English pub
review_data.content: Yes, I know I'm not from England but I've been in lots of English pubs already and I can say it feels like a proper English pub somewhere in the middle of England. It has a very lively atmosphere, especially in the evenings. There's lots...More

review_data.title: Good pub in Zurich
review_data.content: We stopped in as we were hungry and not looking for typical food. The pub from outside looks small, but it's not the case! Inside there are a lot of sits and tables. Me and my friend had a regular burger and a mix of...More

review_data.title: Great Burger in pricey Zurich
review_data.content: We stopped in as we were hungry and not looking for typical Swiss/German food. My wife had a regular burger with cheese and bacon CF20 and I had some monster burger that was huge but CHF 30.Both burgers were cooked perfectly. The beer was cold...More

review_data.title: Great place for expats
review_data.content: Great pub, you see what you get and that is a good genuine English pub with no fancy trimmings but as an expat guaranteed to feel at home . With many special events to let you foget you are here in Zurich

review_data.title: Looking for a pint,.....
review_data.content: Nice little pub, in the old town,... Mr Pickwick/Oliver Twist. Friendly staff, good beer and food too!!!

review_data.title: Nice atmosphere, but burgers are mediocre
review_data.content: I have passed by this pub several times and actually looked in the doors, but today, Easter Monday, I had lunch and was surprised by the size of the pub. The front entrance has a bar and a few tables and tv showing live sports....More

review_data.title: Gut zum Fußball gucken.
review_data.content: Wir trafen uns hier mit einigen Kollegen zum Fußball gucken. Champions league mit englischer Beteiligung. Der Pub war entsprechend gefüllt,...More

review_data.title: Authentic British pub
review_data.content: Feeling homesick, then this does the trick! Good selection of beers and good pub grub. The Big Ben burger is a challenge!

review_data.title: Old Pub in the Old Town...
review_data.content: If you're looking for a traditional old British pub in Zürich, then this is definitely it. Low ceilings, dark wood, booths, old carpets and a slightly stuffy and stale odour. Oliver's Twist has it all and in bucket loads. There's nothing special about this place,...More

review_data.title: A bit of England in Old Town
review_data.content: Just went here for a drink and enjoyed the convivial atmosphere and bright decor. Very British pub in every way. We were there on a Thursday night and it was crowded, obviously popular with the expat crowd! Food looked like standard pub fare and burgers...More

review_data.title: Not bad at all!
review_data.content: Having lived in and visited England, I'd say that this place is a totally acceptable slice of English culture in Zürich. Sure, it's not as spick-and-span (nor as elite) as the James Joyce, not as huge, gloomy and industrial as the Nelson's, and certainly not...More

review_data.title: Claims to be the oldest pub in zurich
review_data.content: we have been there several times, with friends, colleagues, partner etc... It's a pub like many others but so much in the old city center, you can't miss it. Amazing the time when the girl dancing all dizzy on a Saturday night then came to...More

review_data.title: Poor Excuse for an English Pub
review_data.content: There are better bars in the old town and better expat pubs in Zurich. Continues the run-down shabby experience of the other OliverTwist/Pickwicks pubs in Geneva and Luzerne, Added extra was the offensive Australian barman criticising our choice of lager.

review_data.title: Gute Pub-Küche!
review_data.content: Im alten Irischen Pub in der Altstadt von Zürich, einen Treffpunkt vieler Expats aus Englisch sprechenden Ländern, findet man nicht...More
